verses.verse: Let him <S%H5401>kiss<s%> me with the <S%H5390>kisses<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> for your <S%H1730>love<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

Because of the <S%H7381>smell<s%> of your <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8081>ointments<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> is as <S%H8081>ointment<s%> <S%H7324>poured<s%> forth, <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> do the <S%H5959>virgins<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> you.

<S%H4900>Draw<s%> me, we will <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you: the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H935>brought<s%> me into his <S%H2315>chambers:<s%> we will be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in you, we will <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H1730>love<s%> more than <S%H3196>wine:<s%> the <S%H4339>upright<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> you.

I am <S%H7838>black,<s%> but <S%H5000>comely,<s%> O you <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> as the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> as the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

<S%H7200>Look<s%> not on me, because I am <S%H7840>black,<s%> because the <S%H8121>sun<s%> has <S%H7805>looked<s%> on me: my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> were <S%H2734>angry<s%> with me; they <S%H7760>made<s%> me the <S%H5201>keeper<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%> but my own <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> have I not <S%H5201>kept.<s%>

<S%H5046>Tell<s%> me, O you whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves,<s%> <S%H349>where<s%> you <S%H7462>feed,<s%> <S%H349>where<s%> you make your flock to <S%H7257>rest<s%> at <S%H6672>noon:<s%> for <S%H4100>why<s%> should I be as one that <S%H5844>turns<s%> <S%H5844>aside<s%> by the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of your <S%H2270>companions?<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> not, O you <S%H3303>fairest<s%> among <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> your way <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and <S%H7462>feed<s%> your <S%H1423>kids<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds'<s%> <S%H4908>tents.<s%>
I have <S%H1819>compared<s%> you, O my <S%H7474>love,<s%> to a company of <S%H5484>horses<s%> in <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H7393>chariots.<s%>
Your <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> are <S%H4998>comely<s%> with <S%H8447>rows<s%> of <S%H3627>jewels,<s%> your <S%H6677>neck<s%> with <S%H2737>chains<s%> of gold.
We will <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H8447>borders<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> with <S%H5351>studs<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
<S%H5704>While<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> sits at his <S%H4524>table,<s%> my <S%H5373>spikenard<s%> <S%H5414>sends<s%> forth the <S%H7381>smell<s%> thereof.
A <S%H6872>bundle<s%> of <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> is my <S%H1730>well-beloved<s%> to me; he shall <S%H3885>lie<s%> <S%H3885>all<s%> night <S%H996>between<s%> my <S%H7699>breasts.<s%>
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is to me as a <S%H811>cluster<s%> of <S%H3724>camphire<s%> in the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> of <S%H5872>Engedi.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you are <S%H3302>fair,<s%> my <S%H7474>love;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you are <S%H3302>fair;<s%> you have <S%H3123>doves'<s%> <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
The <S%H6982>beams<s%> of our <S%H1004>house<s%> are <S%H730>cedar,<s%> and our <S%H7351>rafters<s%> of <S%H1266>fir.<s%>
